EmailTemplate.name: MAP Dealer Purchase Tundra & Hopper
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you so much for reaching out to YETI! We are just as excited as you are about the new prices on select Tundra and Hopper products! For all purchases made through one of our authorized dealers, please reach out to that dealer for more information about this price change.
For more information on purchases made at YETI.com, please click here:https://www.yeti.com/shipping-and-returns.html
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
